CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-06-19 12:58
Subject: Live with ExCom, Planning your Summer, LeadForward Comes to Close, IT Support now on WhatsApp, Exclusive Garage Sale, VEO x Chalhoub Group, Weekly internal Opportunities
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/aa1fe55e23ea71fcd27d3ba4c7fd77621794538004.gif> 	

Today, we hear from two more ExCom members who are driving the systems and infrastructure that power our Group, Andreu and Kamran, as they share how we’re building smarter, faster, and more scalable ways of working.​

Watch the videos here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1276&user=10620>  and remember to submit your questions anonymously in advance here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1277&user=10620> .​

Register here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1278&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/0be1334662dd0d0c1214f935a49aae2e1507666280.gif>

Watch the videos here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1276&user=10620>  and remember to submit your questions anonymously in advance here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1277&user=10620> .​

Register here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1278&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/0be1334662dd0d0c1214f935a49aae2e1507666280.gif> 	




Andreu highlights how we’re transforming operations to improve efficiency, speed, and service levels, and the importance of cross-functional collaboration in delivering seamless customer experiences.


Kamran shares how data and technology are helping us make better, faster decisions across the business, and why digital adoption is key to unlocking long-term value and innovation.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/a2a8f63fa331b72edab46c7eb51721651978205957.gif> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/50c4e6fca90caef44e050faf087eec3f859841079.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-1-min.png> 	

Planning Your Summer?

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1279&user=10620> 	

 Here’s What You Need to Know!
Summer is a great time to take a well-deserved break or explore the option of working from a different location. As you start planning, make sure to align with your manager and log your annual leave or working-from-abroad dates on DRIVE <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1280&user=10620> .

chunks.text:
Here’s What You Need to Know!
Summer is a great time to take a well-deserved break or explore the option of working from a different location. As you start planning, make sure to align with your manager and log your annual leave or working-from-abroad dates on DRIVE <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1280&user=10620> .

Key reminders:

*	You can work from abroad up to 4 weeks per year (max. 2 weeks at a time).
*	When combining Annual Leave and Work Overseas, you can be abroad for a total of 1 month at a time.
*	Time difference between locations should not exceed 5 hours.

Check the full details here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1279&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-2-min.png> 	

LeadForward Comes to a Close

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1281&user=10620> 	

After 18 months, 6 immersive experiences, and 4 Growth Circles, the LeadForward journey has come to an end. The programme was a space for stretching comfort zones, building cross-functional connections, and growing together. A huge thank you to the incredible cohort and the team behind the scenes who brought it all to life.

Check out more from the final event <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1281&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-3-min.png> 	

IT Support Now on WhatsApp

Check out more from the final event <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1281&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-3-min.png> 	

IT Support Now on WhatsApp

As part of our ongoing commitment to modernize IT support, our Tech Team has launched WhatsApp messaging with Service Desk, making it easier than ever to get the help you need.
Whether you're reporting an issue or looking for quick answers. Just chat on WhatsApp +971 4804 5755.
Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1282&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1282&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/04-4-min.png> 	

Exclusive Garage Sale

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/d273e22ccfd88ddc0021e4eca177bdbc489903325.png> 	


Enjoy up to 90% off on L'Occitane, Elemis, Erborian, and Sol de Janeiro! 
Available exclusively for Chalhoub Group team members on 25th June and 26th June at the L'Occitane D3 Office.

Cash payment only. T&Cs apply.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/05-7-min.png> 	

VEO x Chalhoub Group

We’ve partnered with VEO Fitness to bring you special discounted memberships, designed to support your wellness journey.


Special Rates for our team members:
12 Months: AED 5039 (Premium) | AED 4012 (Single)
6 Months: AED 2959 (Premium) | AED 2416 (Single)
Required for registration:
- Passport or Emirates ID
- Employee ID or One Chalhoub Account

Visit our Chalhoub Career Site <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1284&user=10620>  for all our vacancies and use your Chalhoub email address to be recognized as Internal!  

You can also refer your network directly through our Internal Referral Platform <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1285&user=10620>  – let’s grow our Group together!
